Uses of Package
Game

  • Packages that use Game 
    Package Description
    Card
    The Card classes represent actions that a Player must take when they draw a Card after landing on the Community Card space or the Chance Card space on the game board.
    Database
    The Database Controller classes are a set of Facades for database access.
    Game
    These are the classes that form the main game and web site functions.
  • Classes in Game used by Card 
    Class and Description
    GameServlet
    This is the main Servlet class that handles Player actions and requests.
  • Classes in Game used by Database 
    Class and Description
    Bank
    The bank owns all the properties, so whenever a player wants to buy or mortgage a property, he needs to call the bank class.
    BankAccount
    The BankAccount class keeps track of the account balance of a particular player.
  • Classes in Game used by Game 
    Class and Description
    Bank
    The bank owns all the properties, so whenever a player wants to buy or mortgage a property, he needs to call the bank class.
    BankAccount
    The BankAccount class keeps track of the account balance of a particular player.
    Dice
    This class takes the responsibility to roll the dice and return the total dice value of the dice rolled.
